name: Migrant Seeking a Family Based Visa
text: Migrant Seeking a Family Based Visa

children.name: DNA will be required to prove genetic relationship
children.text: DNA will be required to prove genetic relationship

children.name: Applicant contacts AABB accredited lab to begin testing
children.text: Applicant contacts AABB accredited lab to begin testing

children.name: AABB lab instructs applicant where to go for collection
children.text: AABB lab instructs applicant where to go for collection

children.name: Clinic responsible for collection sends sample (plus some) to AABB accredited lab
children.text: Clinic responsible for collection sends sample (plus some) to AABB accredited lab

children.name: 99.5% = satisfactory
Request test kit from AABB accredited lab to be sent to embassy
children.text: Request test kit from AABB accredited lab to be sent to embassy

children.name: Collection must be done at a U.S. consulate or embassy, under the supervision of a Cleared American witness

children.name: Sample sent back to AABB lab and tested
children.text: Sample sent back to AABB lab and tested

children.name: Results sent back to cleared American witness and entered into ECAS
